output.sentences: Everyone was so creative with their costumes this Halloween, but only the most creative costume would win.
A cowboy is always a creative idea.
The winner impressed the judge who as also a cowboy, so we all know what customes didn't win.
We thought that was unfair, but the participants still gathered for more fun, and had a great time on Halloween night.
